plugin.name: Windvane
plugin.summary: Plugin to provide windvane like autopilot
plugin.author: Jon Gough
plugin.description: Windvane Autopilot is designed to use the wind instruments and autopilot on board the yatch to act like a standard windvane autopilot and allow the yatch to follow the wind.

plugin.name: Autopilot Route
plugin.author: Sean D'Epagnier
plugin.description: Configurable Autopilot Route following abilities.

plugin.name: NmeaConverter_pi
plugin.summary: Plugin to change and cherrypich from other NMEA sentences
plugin.author: RooieDirk
plugin.description: NmeaConverter is a plugin where you can manipulate or add new nmea sentences. It is rather tricky and easy to make mistakes that will 'hang' OpenCPN, but if used right very powerfull

plugin.name: NSK
plugin.summary: NMEA0183 to SignalK converter plugin for OpenCPN
plugin.author: Pavel Kalian
plugin.description: NMEA0183 to SignalK converter plugin for OpenCPN

plugin.name: S63
plugin.summary: OpenCPN support for S63 Vector Charts
plugin.author: David S Register
plugin.description: OpenCPN support for S63 Vector Charts

plugin.name: DashboardTactics
plugin.author: Rick Gleason
plugin.description: Dashboard PlugIn with Tactics for OpenCPN Provides navigation instruments enhanced with performance functions and alternative input/output functions.

plugin.name: GPS Odometer
plugin.author: LennartG
plugin.description: GPS controlled Dashboard based Odometer plugin for OpenCPN, displays GPS calculated Log and Trip information

plugin.name: Tactics
plugin.author: Tom R
plugin.description: Tactics PlugIn for OpenCPN Provides performance data and instrument display from NMEA source and polar file.

plugin.name: NmeaConverter_pi
plugin.summary: Plugin to change and cherrypich from other NMEA sentences
plugin.author: RooieDirk
plugin.description: NmeaConverter is a plugin where you can manipulate or add new nmea sentences. It is rather tricky and easy to make mistakes that will 'hang' OpenCPN, but if used right very powerfull

plugin.name: S63
plugin.summary: OpenCPN support for S63 Vector Charts
plugin.author: David S Register
plugin.description: OpenCPN support for S63 Vector Charts

plugin.name: Windvane
plugin.summary: Plugin to provide windvane like autopilot
plugin.author: Jon Gough
plugin.description: Windvane Autopilot is designed to use the wind instruments and autopilot on board the yatch to act like a standard windvane autopilot and allow the yatch to follow the wind.

plugin.name: Windvane
plugin.summary: Plugin to provide windvane like autopilot
plugin.author: Jon Gough
plugin.description: Windvane Autopilot is designed to use the wind instruments and autopilot on board the yatch to act like a standard windvane autopilot and allow the yatch to follow the wind.

plugin.name: TwoCan Plugin
plugin.summary: TwoCan Plugin, integrates OpenCPN with NMEA 2000 networks
plugin.author: twocanplugin@hotmail.com
plugin.description: TwoCan Plugin, integrates OpenCPN with NMEA 2000 networks by converting NMEA 2000 messages to NMEA 183 sentences for use by OpenCPN

plugin.name: OCPN Draw
plugin.summary: Drawing Plugin to allow extra objects to be drawn and used within OCPN
plugin.author: Jon Gough
plugin.description: OCPN_DRAW (OD) is a plugin that extends the capability of OCPN to include non-standard object: Boundaries, Boundary Points, Text Points, Dead Reckoning paths, Electronic Bearing Lines (EBL) and Guard Zones. The plugin also has an API to allow other plugins to directly interact with it.

plugin.name: Engine Dashboard
plugin.author: twocanplugin@hotmail.com
plugin.description: Engine Dashboard, Displays Engine RPM, Oil Pressure, Water Temperature, Alternator Output and tank levels.

plugin.name: TideFinder
plugin.summary: Tidal HW/LW prediction into the future
plugin.author: Mike Rossiter
plugin.description: Extends the tidal predictions of OpenCPN using a calendar to allow easier future predictions.

plugin.name: IACFleet
plugin.author: Pavel Kalian
plugin.description: IAC Fleetcode plugin for OpenCPN

plugin.name: otidalplan
plugin.author: Mike Rossiter
plugin.description: Calculates Estimated Positions using tidal harmonics.

plugin.name: ShipDriver
plugin.author: Mike Rossiter
plugin.description: Simulates navigation of a vessel. Using the sail option and a current grib file for wind data, simulates how a sailing vessel might react in those conditions. Using 'Preferences' the simulator is able to record AIS data from itself. This can be replayed to simulate collision situations.

plugin.name: Radar
plugin.summary: Overlays the radar picture on OpenCPN
plugin.author: Hakan Svensson / Douwe Fokkema / Kees Verruijt / David S Register
plugin.description: Garmin, Navico and Raymarine radar support WARNING: OPENGL MODE IS REQUIRED! Works with Garmin HD, xHD, Navico BR24, 3G, 4G, HALOxx and several Raymarine radars. When a compass heading is provided it will allow radar overlay on the chart(s). It also allows separate display of a traditional radar picture (PPI). Supports MARPA (even on radars that do not support this themselves), Guard zones, AIS overlay on PPI, and various radar dependent features such as dual radar range and Doppler.

plugin.name: TideFinder
plugin.summary: Tidal HW/LW prediction into the future
plugin.author: Mike Rossiter
plugin.description: Extends the tidal predictions of OpenCPN using a calendar to allow easier future predictions.

plugin.name: OCPN Draw
plugin.summary: Drawing Plugin to allow extra objects to be drawn and used within OCPN
plugin.author: Jon Gough
plugin.description: OCPN_DRAW (OD) is a plugin that extends the capability of OCPN to include non-standard object: Boundaries, Boundary Points, Text Points, Dead Reckoning paths, Electronic Bearing Lines (EBL) and Guard Zones. The plugin also has an API to allow other plugins to directly interact with it.

plugin.name: TideFinder
plugin.summary: Tidal HW/LW prediction into the future
plugin.author: Mike Rossiter
plugin.description: Extends the tidal predictions of OpenCPN using a calendar to allow easier future predictions.

plugin.name: Radar
plugin.summary: Overlays the radar picture on OpenCPN
plugin.author: Hakan Svensson / Douwe Fokkema / Kees Verruijt / David S Register
plugin.description: Garmin, Navico and Raymarine radar support WARNING: OPENGL MODE IS REQUIRED! Works with Garmin HD, xHD, Navico BR24, 3G, 4G, HALOxx and several Raymarine radars. When a compass heading is provided it will allow radar overlay on the chart(s). It also allows separate display of a traditional radar picture (PPI). Supports MARPA (even on radars that do not support this themselves), Guard zones, AIS overlay on PPI, and various radar dependent features such as dual radar range and Doppler.

plugin.name: Radar
plugin.summary: Overlays the radar picture on OpenCPN
plugin.author: Hakan Svensson / Douwe Fokkema / Kees Verruijt / David S Register

plugin.description: TwoCan Plugin, integrates OpenCPN with NMEA 2000 networks by converting NMEA 2000 messages to NMEA 183 sentences for use by OpenCPN

plugin.name: DashboardTactics
plugin.author: Rick Gleason
plugin.description: Dashboard PlugIn with Tactics for OpenCPN Provides navigation instruments enhanced with performance functions and alternative input/output functions.

plugin.name: Race Start Display
plugin.summary: Race Start Display, A simple tool for yacht racing
plugin.author: twocanplugin@hotmail.com
plugin.description: Race Start Display, A simple tool for yacht racing, Displays countdown timer, distance and time to start line

plugin.name: Engine Dashboard
plugin.author: twocanplugin@hotmail.com
plugin.description: Engine Dashboard, Displays Engine RPM, Oil Pressure, Water Temperature, Alternator Output and tank levels.

plugin.name: Windvane
plugin.summary: Plugin to provide windvane like autopilot
plugin.author: Jon Gough
plugin.description: Windvane Autopilot is designed to use the wind instruments and autopilot on board the yatch to act like a standard windvane autopilot and allow the yatch to follow the wind.

plugin.name: DashboardTactics
plugin.author: Rick Gleason
plugin.description: Dashboard PlugIn with Tactics for OpenCPN Provides navigation instruments enhanced with performance functions and alternative input/output functions.

plugin.name: Tactics
plugin.author: Tom R
plugin.description: Tactics PlugIn for OpenCPN Provides performance data and instrument display from NMEA source and polar file.

plugin.name: ShipDriver
plugin.author: Mike Rossiter
plugin.description: Simulates navigation of a vessel. Using the sail option and a current grib file for wind data, simulates how a sailing vessel might react in those conditions. Using 'Preferences' the simulator is able to record AIS data from itself. This can be replayed to simulate collision situations.

plugin.name: Launcher
plugin.author: Pavel Kalian
plugin.description: Launcher plugin for OpenCPN

plugin.name: OCPN Draw
plugin.summary: Drawing Plugin to allow extra objects to be drawn and used within OCPN
plugin.author: Jon Gough
plugin.description: OCPN_DRAW (OD) is a plugin that extends the capability of OCPN to include non-standard object: Boundaries, Boundary Points, Text Points, Dead Reckoning paths, Electronic Bearing Lines (EBL) and Guard Zones. The plugin also has an API to allow other plugins to directly interact with it.

plugin.name: ShipDriver
plugin.author: Mike Rossiter
plugin.description: Simulates navigation of a vessel. Using the sail option and a current grib file for wind data, simulates how a sailing vessel might react in those conditions. Using 'Preferences' the simulator is able to record AIS data from itself. This can be replayed to simulate collision situations.

plugin.name: Tactics
plugin.author: Tom R
plugin.description: Tactics PlugIn for OpenCPN Provides performance data and instrument display from NMEA source and polar file.

plugin.name: Windvane
plugin.summary: Plugin to provide windvane like autopilot
plugin.author: Jon Gough
plugin.description: Windvane Autopilot is designed to use the wind instruments and autopilot on board the yatch to act like a standard windvane autopilot and allow the yatch to follow the wind.

plugin.name: DashboardSK
plugin.author: Pavel Kalian
plugin.description: DashboardSK plugin for OpenCPN

plugin.name: NmeaConverter_pi
plugin.summary: Plugin to change and cherrypich from other NMEA sentences
plugin.author: RooieDirk
plugin.description: NmeaConverter is a plugin where you can manipulate or add new nmea sentences. It is rather tricky and easy to make mistakes that will 'hang' OpenCPN, but if used right very powerfull

plugin.name: Race Start Display
plugin.summary: Race Start Display, A simple tool for yacht racing
plugin.author: twocanplugin@hotmail.com
plugin.description: Race Start Display, A simple tool for yacht racing, Displays countdown timer, distance and time to start line

plugin.name: Launcher
plugin.author: Pavel Kalian
plugin.description: Launcher plugin for OpenCPN

plugin.name: Radar
plugin.summary: Overlays the radar picture on OpenCPN
plugin.author: Hakan Svensson / Douwe Fokkema / Kees Verruijt / David S Register
plugin.description: Garmin, Navico and Raymarine radar support WARNING: OPENGL MODE IS REQUIRED! Works with Garmin HD, xHD, Navico BR24, 3G, 4G, HALOxx and several Raymarine radars. When a compass heading is provided it will allow radar overlay on the chart(s). It also allows separate display of a traditional radar picture (PPI). Supports MARPA (even on radars that do not support this themselves), Guard zones, AIS overlay on PPI, and various radar dependent features such as dual radar range and Doppler.

plugin.name: Autopilot Route
plugin.author: Sean D'Epagnier
plugin.description: Configurable Autopilot Route following abilities.

plugin.name: OCPN Draw
plugin.summary: Drawing Plugin to allow extra objects to be drawn and used within OCPN
plugin.author: Jon Gough
plugin.description: OCPN_DRAW (OD) is a plugin that extends the capability of OCPN to include non-standard object: Boundaries, Boundary Points, Text Points, Dead Reckoning paths, Electronic Bearing Lines (EBL) and Guard Zones. The plugin also has an API to allow other plugins to directly interact with it.

plugin.name: S63
plugin.summary: OpenCPN support for S63 Vector Charts
plugin.author: David S Register
plugin.description: OpenCPN support for S63 Vector Charts

plugin.author: Tom R
plugin.description: Tactics PlugIn for OpenCPN Provides performance data and instrument display from NMEA source and polar file.

plugin.summary: NMEA0183 to SignalK converter plugin for OpenCPN
plugin.author: Pavel Kalian
plugin.description: NMEA0183 to SignalK converter plugin for OpenCPN

plugin.name: SailawayNMEA
plugin.author: Mike Rossiter
plugin.description: Provides NMEA feed from the Sailaway simgame.

plugin.name: Autopilot Route
plugin.author: Sean D'Epagnier
plugin.description: Configurable Autopilot Route following abilities.

plugin.name: otidalplan
plugin.author: Mike Rossiter
plugin.description: Calculates Estimated Positions using tidal harmonics.

plugin.summary: Drawing Plugin to allow extra objects to be drawn and used within OCPN
plugin.author: Jon Gough
plugin.description: OCPN_DRAW (OD) is a plugin that extends the capability of OCPN to include non-standard object: Boundaries, Boundary Points, Text Points, Dead Reckoning paths, Electronic Bearing Lines (EBL) and Guard Zones. The plugin also has an API to allow other plugins to directly interact with it.
